content.detailedDescription: On may 28 2010 around 10pm, me and my girlfriend saw 4 star like objects in the sky that were odd colored and were moving all around the sky. the objects would move up and down, side to side,two of them moved in sequence till one blinked out and the other headed closer to the mountain,and made snake like patterns in the sky. they were moving at a high rate of speed and would also disappear as if a light made been turned off then they would appear again. at one point we saw one of the ufo's appear just over the mountain top, it begin to fly closer towards us and it looked as if it was aware of us looking at it and it approached us. as we felt uncertain of how closer it was going to get to us we started to get frightened and started walking to near by homes. the object went over our heads and blinked out! we also saw one of the other objects appear over the mountain ridge, we could see the object in between 2 houses, it looked like a big star and it seemed out of place. i told my girlfriend to remember the two houses so we would be able to tell if the object moved. we moved further down the street and my girlfriend saw a star that looked like the other one directly across from the other one and as we stood looking at it, it slowly moved up higher in the sky well we watched it move up we suddenly remembered the other object between the 2 houses and went back when we got there it wasn't there anymore. and earlier that day  about 10:20 about 10 huge all black un-marked coppers flew over the town, they appeared military and flew low over the town.Dunsmuir is a small town that has never had that much air traffic and even when there is an air craft in the sky its usually only one and if its flying low it 99% of the time looking for some kind of drug bust in the mountains. we were unable to take a picture or video.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo sighting in dunsmuir, ca 5/28/10

content.detailedDescription:
May 3, 2010 @ 1:19 p.M., my spouse and i were driving to abilene for my six month medical check up.  we were driving sw on hwy 351. as we were coming up on the wind farm located nw of abilene, i felt the need to take a few photos, so i did. 
 
i had seen several small bright flashes of light in the sky but could not tell what it was.  when i finally downloaded the photos to my laptop, two particular photos stood out.  to the extreme left of the first photo, are some white dots.  this is the location in the sky where the flashes of light caught my attention.  in the center of the photo is an unknown object and 3 quarters of the way up from the bottom of the photo and just left of center, there appears to be an obtuse triangle formation of lights.  there are a couple of light streaks but i am assuming they are minute scratches on the windshield, along with an amount of bug splats.  

after i downloaded the photos and looked at them, i went out to the pickup and checked to see if any of these anomalies might match up with the bug splatters but they didn't, so i decided it might be worth reporting.

the photo was taken with a sony cyber-shot, f/7, 1/640 sec., 100 iso, apt-3, fl-10mm, no flash.

i also have another photo taken on the way back (again through the windshield), that shows white orb-like objects in an entirely different location.  they are not reflections, smudges, birds, airplanes, venus, swamp gas, etc.  i have the unedited originals and will send the second photo upon request.
content.summary: Objects seen in photos taken during a trip to abilene, texas

content.detailedDescription:
It was a beautiful sunny weather, no single cloud in the sky. i was sitting in my room and looked at the sky, a few seconds later i saw a white(ish) circle-shaped object moving quite fast. can't really say how fast and how far away it was... it took it approx. 10-12 seconds to disappear behind a building. unfortunately i was too slow to take a picture. but! a few minutes later i saw a similar object moving in the same direction. this time i took my camera and took 2 pics. it is very small. at first i thought it was a helicopter but i think it was too fast and it doesn't really look like one. definitely doesn't look like a plane, does it? i think it might be a bird but i'm sending two pics to you just in case.

sorry the pics are so big but thanks to that you can see that object more clearly.
content.summary: White circle-shaped object(s)

content.detailedDescription: just wondering if anybody else was inquiring into the object seen in front of the st. augustine pier thursday, may 27th 2010 at approx. 11pm. there were several people on the beach at the time who noticed this. it at first appeared to be an airplane headed south to north but it was peculiar as it was quite low and the headlight looked like an orange fireball. it was moving quite fast and i told the person i was with "see, that is why people always think they see ufo's. wait till it gets closer and you can see the blinking lights and you'll see that a plane can look like a ufo from a distance." well... the "plane" came very fast up the beach and when it got just in front of the pier (half mile south of our position) it stopped and hovered. this threw us off guard and i thought, damn, is this a ufo? then the aircraft shot a jet stream out the back as it hovered... only the jet stream looked like sparks flying out of the back. the craft got very bright, again resembling a fireball in the sky. it began moving again and just a few seconds after the movement the lights went out completely. we watched for another 20 minutes but saw nothing. there were a few airplanes in the background that really showed how different this craft was from a traditional plane. there were no other crafts in the immediate vicinity, it made no noise, and was approx the size of what you would expect a plane to be. it is possible that is was some sort of military craft.
content.summary: Unidentified aircraft in front of st. augustine pier had fireball appearance.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out into backyard to let dogs out at about 10:05 pm. it was a full moon. i looked into wnw sky and saw 3 large (5x lger than biggest planet i've seen)white circles of light in formation of pyramid.  not moving but getting brighter.  i called my friend to come outside and she said "omg" when she the lights. they stayed still and hugely bright in formation for about 5-7 minutes. then they all moved slowly at same time tightening up the pyramid shape.  then somehow still in formation they appeared smaller but still a pyramid but with smaller lights.  the one on the left flew off to the left and became small, like a lg star.  a plane from somewhere flew to it and past it and then this smaller circle of light stopped flying and remained stationary but now looked like a plane with some blinking lights.  after a few minutes it flew off to the left (s) looking like a regular plane.  back to the 2 remaining cirles of light that were bright and hadn't moved anymore.  now the top one of the once pyramid shape also flew to the left getting smaller as it flew and then it too just looked like a plane with blinking lights.  the 3rd remaining stationary light now also took off flying to the left and then as it was getting smaller it too looked like an airplane.  when i say looked like an airplane- it was an appropriate speed, size and lighting of a plane, as we live a little outside to the flight pattern to regional southwest airport in fort myers, we see lots of planes in the night sky.  there was no noise.
we both were in awe.  i have seen something like this in sedona over 20 yrs ago- but my friend had never experienced such an unexplainable sight, especially to her the fact that they were so large and didn't move for so long.
content.summary: 3 lg bright circular lights in formation of pyramid moving forming smaller pyramid

content.detailedDescription:
Time was around 11:00 pm, i was in the conyers,ga longhorn steakhouse,picking up my girlfriend from work.

last year march 8th 2009, me and my brother had a siting at our residence.
(this is why i keep a close lookout when i'm outside)

anyhow, i was waiting for my girlfriend to come out of work, when i noticed that the clouds kept moving in a weird pattern. they'd cover the full moon for a minute, then next minute the thick patch of clouds would move off to the right side of the moon. . they'd then cover again, then to the left side they go, exposing the full moon.

i looked at that as somewhat weird. . anyhow, i then got out of the truck, as i waited, and video recorded the moon alone, when it was exposed. (for a couple minutes) just to review on my bigscreen, to see if i saw anything.

anyhow, after she came out to see me shooting the moon, we got in the car, and i told her that it was looking weird up by the moon. 

after around 30 minutes or so, we took a right turn from salem rd. onto highway 162 in route to the house, i looked up at the moon, and right as i looked up, a bright light flew from under the patch of clouds. i freaked and brought it to her attention. by the time she spotted the object, it was in the windshield view.

it went from my driverside window view, to windshield,all the way over to her passenger side window view. within 5 seconds. i'd say, 2-3 seconds.

she had the camera, but instead of missing out on seeing this, she looked with her own eyes, and described the object as triangular, with 3 solid bright lights at each tip of the triangle. between the front point on each side, were 2 pulsating lights, that illuminated one after the other. as one dimmed the other got brighter.

we talked about it all night, and to this day, still are amazed with what we saw. i told my brother that we saw another ufo, and he was amazed.

i know , that what we saw (me , for the second time), did not move like any craft that's here. . she believed me in what me and my brother saw last year, and after seeing it for herself. she's 100%.

as i said, i have video of the moon before the occurance, maybe 30 minutes before. and she's willing to sketch the placement of the lights that we saw.

if possible, please contact me via e-mail or cell phone number provided.

[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Ufo flew from under a patch of clouds,and moved from my driver side window to the passenger side view.

content.detailedDescription:
On may 28, 2010 at approximately 1930 hrs mst while taking pictures of an interesting sunset over the franklin mountains, from the perspective of the northeast side in front of my home, i did not see anything unusual until i imported the raw files from my canon eos 50d digital camera into adobe lightroom for viewing.

whiel reviewing the numerous images taken of the sunset, i observed a set of six images within a 2.5 - 3 minute time frame that displayed an odd object with what appeared to be three lighted points with a greenish tint to them.  the center light had a red halo surrounding it.

at first, i thought that these were lens flares from my l-series lens (decent quality), but after looking at them more closely and observing the position change of the object, i am not so convinced anymore.  i did not observe this anomaly on any other images of the set taken.  the photos containing the object occurred over a 2.5 minute period or so, then disappeared in the very next frame.  i invite you to review the images i uploaded to flickr.  in any event, i thought you may be interested in taking a look and seeing what you think.  i suppose one never knows.  the images may be found at:

http://www.Flickr.Com/photos/sgreeneptx/sets/72157624157389050/

these are resized versions of the originals for the sake of posting.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Greenish tri-light with red tint in center

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from my friends house on highway 78 in snellville/grayson.  then i turned left on grayson pkwy and i noticed about 15 to 20 bright orange spheres in a line above the trees to my right.  i pulled into my driveway and ran to my backyard and could now only see about 4 or 5 of them.  they had changed patterns. they were circling each other. they kept getting lower until it was almost like they disappeared. it was hard to say how far away they were.  from the time i got in my backyard they were gone within 3 minutes or so.    when i first noticed them i thought it was possibly some lights from a cell tower but then they starting moving.  i woke my husband up and we sat outside for a few hours but they did not return.
content.summary: 15 to 20 bright orange lights above the trees..  highway 78 and grayson pkwy.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
The year was 1997, and myself and friends had just begun a project in school on ufos, i was 10 years old, turning 11. we studied ufos ( ..Or anyhow we did a statue of an alien..And showed :) ) for a project in unknown cratures, myth-legend stuff..

it was spring and some snowpiles was still to be seen, the sun was shining and the sky was clear.

i was playing outside of school, the boys were playing bandy, girls jumping ropes, myself just goofing around. when one of the girls comes rushing to me shoutinng "look ��������� a ufo!" me and my friends beside me look to the sky and we see a flying saucer, (just like the ones we were currently studying... imagine the feeling :) 
it flies above us, but a little bit to the right.. ;p it shines in silvery white, it may have been pure white, or the sun reflectng.. it shined anyhow..No rotation, if i recall, just hovering above our heads silently passing by.. i thought this is the real deal, they were here..

it went in a certain direction.. behind a tall building.

we watched it glide and away from us, i ran to the teachers office, telling of the sight. this is my best memory. confirmation.

my friend ������������ ran after it he says, to see if it was still behind the school building... but it wasnt..

since this day i have been aware of them, but not whom they are... still waiting..
 (this ufo looked just like the saucer in the x-files intro, more shine though. picture included)




i have seen one more ufo ( and countless others, but may aswell been, whatever junk you throw up there.. as they moved straight, this the second ufo moved not like any man made thing) 

watching out my window i saw what i thought was a star, but as i realized it wasnt, as it was resting in the big dipper.. and the second i noticed.. it noticed that i noticed.. in an instant, it started spinning like mad around the star "dubhe", and after a few spins, it flew right into dubhe what it appeared, like in star wars, millenium falcon. fast. 
big as a star it was, so very high up, and mind reading, or perfect timing.. or they have some good eye sight.

im hoping that the 3rd time's the charm ;)
content.summary: A flying saucer in swedens forest + a spinning star around dubhe

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother where in the front yard talking and we saw a couple of shooting stars. so we decided to keep looking up to see more, we saw two constant non blinking white lighted objects moving north to northeast one following the other exactly but a little ways behind it but close enough to see them both at the same time and tell one was following the other. we past those off as satillites. a few seconds later i saw what looked to be the same kind of object either way smaller or way higher up going the opposite way at a very fast speed compared to the "satillites". i tried to point it out to my brother whom has way worse vision than me, and i tried to point it out by using bigger stars. to our southeast there was an upside down triangle formation of stars all by its self in view slightly above the big or lil dipper not sure which but from our angle triangle was upside down and if you were looking at the dipper right side up the triangle would be falling into it sideways. the tiny or far object was about to pass directly under the bottom star of the triangle. i told my brother to focus on that star in hopes he might see the fast object. he did not see the object moving fast, however as soon as the object looked like it flew directly beneth the bottom  star, the star grew at least six times its size and turn from white to purple then just started cruesing off in the same direction as the smaller object was going.  a couple other people we have talked to over the past couple of days have seem to have seen the same thing. all i know is this was all the proof we needed to see this seemingly impossible sight.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Unknown
content.summary: Small white when still. blows up big and purple when moving..

content.detailedDescription: This took place in waycross, ga. i was about 10 yrs old, playing with a brother in a lightly wooded area behind our home, approx. 50 ft away. i saw a lot of turbulence in the clouds toward the front of our home, about half a mile away. the craft left the clouds & started descending in a wide half-circular pattern, slowing as it approached our home. it flew towards our home slowly at treetop level & stopped over the front of our home, remained motionless for about 1 minute, then flew away rapidly to our left, climbing into the clouds gradually. i think our home faced the north, so the craft left towards the west. it's departure only took about 5 seconds. the craft resembled a submersible vehicle, no visible or recognizable  propulsion, metallic surface, was a straight cylinder, with domed ends, @ a beltline that ran down the sides from front to back. along this beltline were several round domes, spaced evenly. on top of the craft towards one end there was a large bulge or pod projecting upwards, on the opposite end of the craft, on top, there was a large structure or mechanism that i could not identify. my brother & i stood in a clearing with an unobstructed view of the craft & watched it in disbelief, it just stood there, silently hovering. i seemed to sense a vibration in the air, & felt nervous about seeing this. the craft seemed to be doing something, but i couldn't tell what. my comprehension was being pushed past normal limits, then i seemed to come to my senses, the craft turned slightly & flew away. my brother & i had remained standing in the same place during the sighting, & after it left, we ran straight to our home. i felt panicked & scared, & i was thinking that something really strange had happened & that i didn't want to think about it again, yet i wanted to remember it, because it seemed to have major importance.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Craft flew down from clouds, hovered over home as we watched from approx.100 ft distance, then flew away rapidly to our left.

content.detailedDescription: Driving kids home from school, saw a triangle floating in the sky, showed my kids and we pulled over to try and get picture.  as quick as we could pull over it was really close at first, as we got out of the car it was suddenly far away, close enough for me to get a picture.
content.summary: Saw a black and silver triangle floating in sky changing shapes

content.detailedDescription: Monday night at around 10:10 pm i got out of my truck after arriving at my house. while i was walking inside i noticed a very bright star like object. i looked at it and thought i saw it move side to side quickly. i could not tell if it was me shaking or if it was actually moving or not. i watched it for 10 minutes and it continued to move side to side and up and down at different times, but it stayed still for most of the time. i sat down on my bumper of my truck to try to make sure it was not just me shaking but i continued to see it move. i noticed my mother was still awake in the second story of our house. i called her and had her look out the window. i gave her the general direction and she noticed it pretty quickly. she noticed it moving a bit too, but like me she could not tell if it was her or the light moving. we did noticed it move at the same time, but it was still hard to tell. she went to bed because she works early. i watched it for about 15-20 minutes longer and noticed it position had changed slightly from when i first noticed it. i had made a mark on the ground before i sat down so i could tell where i had been originally standing when i noticed it. i do live near an airport that sees a lot of traffic, but i do not believe it could have been a plane staying in pretty much the same area for 30 minutes. sometimes planes look like they are not moving when they are at a distance if they are moving directly towards you or away from you, but within a few minutes of watching you can eventually see it move one way or another. another thing i have noticed about planes is that if they are anywhere near as bright as this object was, they are moving towards you. when the object finally moved out of sight it dimmed from a bright white light to a dull rust colored red and moved down under the tree line. the only thing i can think that this might have been was a helicopter, but i really just did not get the feeling that it was. if it was a search light it was shining, i never saw a beam from it and i never saw it turn at all. i see a few helicopters in the sky around bangor, but i have never seen one sit and hover for 30-40 minutes. when the light dimmed from bright white to dull red i never got the impression that it was turning so i don't believe i was seeing any tail lights. it also did not flash at all. it was always a solid color. the glow the from the white light did seem to twist in place at times.
content.summary: Looked like a very bright star. made wobbling movements, then stood still. stayed put for 30 minutes then slowly moved down below tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of may 27th, my 17 year old son, one of his friends, and i were driving north bound on oracle rd/hwy 77, on our way home from unloading a moving truck. maybe half a mile from mile marker 109 exit, at approximately 7:40pm. my son's friend was the first to notice these strange lights. there were two lights near each other like stars. he described them as brighter than the north star. what really made them stand out, was the fact it was still day light. they appeared to the west between the highway and the mountains to the west of town. we all three agreed as to what was seen next. the lights simply hovered for a few seconds, then one of the lights flew very quickly to the other. then it vanish as though the light was just turned off. then the other vanished as well.

later that night the lights were witnessed again to the west of town, over the mountains. this was approximately 9:45pm, by my son and a different friend than the one that was with him for the first sighting (although there is some debate as to the time, we often have strange time issues with our cellular phones that cause them to show the time as being an hour ahead. i was texting with a friend at approximately 8:45pm which would have made the time the boys came in to tell us about it approximately 8:50pm not 9:50pm) my son was about to walk his friend home, they had been gone only 5 minutes or so, when they came frantically running into the house to tell us of this second sighting.

after walking his friend home, my son walked down to the local minit market, to see if any of his other friends were down there. he wanted to tell them about what he had seen. while standing outside talking to the store clerk, the lights were witnessed for a third time. this time to the east of town, directly after the lights disappeared, two "military" or what my son described as military, jets were seen moving toward the area the lights were seen. the store clerk was so startled by the event, that he stated he wanted to "clock out early and go home", he told my son. this was approximately 10:10pm. my son arrived home at 10:25pm to tell his father and i what he had seen the third time.  the friend he was with for the first sighting at approximately 7:40pm, came over at approximately 10:45pm to tell all of us what he saw at 10:10pm corroborating my sons account of what happened down to the 2 jets, seen from 2 separate locations in town that night.
content.summary: Multiple sightings of strange lights over tri-city area.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my apt for work at aproximately 05:15 5/27/2010
i checking the weather to the north looking at the sky.
i noticed 6 points of light similar to bright stars moving slowly accross the sky in the formation of an upside down "y". they moved from east to west. i held my thumb out against what i was seeing to attempt to gauge size or distance. i cold not. the formation of objects from this perspective were approximately the size of my thumb with my arm fully extended.
my first thought was that this was an airplane since dfw intl. was just a few miles away. i am used to the various approach patterns of airplanes in the area. if these lights were from a known type of plane, i would have heard engines at this distance. i would have also been able to see parts of the aircraft. it would have been moving much faster if it were an airliner. i'm certain, it was not any kind of plane that i have ever seen. the lights stopped breifly. one of the "wing" lights broke away and moved out ahead of the formation and stopped. the formation began to move again. as the formation approached the single light, the single light manuvered to rejoin the formation. once in formation again, all lights stopped.
the lights were clearly visible when suddenly they began to shimmer as though i were looking at them through heat waves. i glanced around to find that no other stars or other objects were shimmering in this way. then the lights faded away as though someone had turned them off with a dimmer switch. the lights made no sound and they did not move exactly to gether as lights fixed to a single platform might.

the size and color of the lights remained consistant with the size, color and brightness of a bright star during this.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Six lights in the sky not behaving like aircraft or baloons

content.detailedDescription:
I was lying on my bed @ 11:00 pm on the 24 may 2010, praying would you believe. when i finished i opened my eyes and noticed a bright object to my left, out of the corner of my eye, moving outside in the sky.  for a split second i thought it was just the bright star/planet that can be seen each night in that direction.  i jumped up to the window and was blown away by what i saw.  i observed, beside the star, another bright, luminous orange (same colour as fire) object, as clear day, moving down diagonally out of the sky slowly (from right to left)and then straighten out to move horizontally across the sky behind the neighbour's house facing ours.  i shouted for my my wife who came into the room at that time and she also observed the object.  she was stunned as she observed this thing outside. the object was very bright and moved silently.  very very clear, its motion was constant and perfectly horizontal as it moved across the sky above/behind the neighbours house across the road.  it did not flicker or wobble in any way or leave any smoke trail against the bright night sky.  it seemed to go out of sight or fade when it reached the bottom of the street. the whole thing lasted maybe 20 seconds from start to finish. afterwards i just couldn't believe what i saw, how close it was (.2 of a kilometer out, maybe a quarter of a kilometer up) and how clear it was against the sky.  my wife said she thought it looked like a rod but i would say it orb like with a slight oval shape.  definately not a plane, star, meteor or even chinese lantern.  it was the strangest thing i've ever seen.

this is the second time i've reported something to mufon in this area.  i think i'm in the flight path lol.
      
note: if it was one of those chinese lanterns it must have had 'light bulbs' instead of candles in it as this thing was as bright as a street light and it must have had its own propulsion as it was moving against the wind.
content.summary: Bright orange object observed slowly travelling down from the sky diagonally, then leveling out to travel horizontally (right to left) across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was resting on my couch when i saw an orange-yellow light shining through my window.  it was a small light, but larger than a star, which is why it caught my attention.  i looked around the room to see if anything was reflecting the light in the window.  i even turned off the tv and lights to make sure, but the light was still there.

i called my husband to look at it, and he said to take a picture of it.  i turned the lights back on in the house, grabbed my camera, and ran outside to take a picture of the light.  the picture turned out blurry.  i then took a video of it.  the video lasted for almost two minutes.

it was a round light that seemed to hover above in the sky in the direction of my neighbor's house across the street to the right.  a couple of times i saw a long white upside-down triange-shaped object for a split second - perhaps when the light turned.

the light hovered for perhaps two minutes then started moving upwards slowly.  it then moved towards my left in the sky towards the houses down my street.  i had my husband hold the camera, and he zoomed in on the light as it went farther and farther away.  it eventually went out of sight.

this was a slow-moving light/object.  it moved much slower than an airplane, and hovered before moving up and away.  the light never blinked as an airplane light does - only the bright white upside-down triangle did.  it wasn't a star because there were other stars in the sky at the time.  it was something - whether a strange military object or extraterrestrial, i don't know - but i have it on film.
content.summary: I saw and videoed a slow-moving constant orange-yellow round light with a white upside-down triangle shape that blinked a couple of times.

content.detailedDescription: Two dark spirals emanating from the clouds downwards.  one quite long and 4 times longer than the other.  at first, since i was driving, i thought the longer one was the trail of smoke and i mentioned to my friend that there must be a large fire to give off that large a trail of smoke.  then, with the next good look, i noticed there were two and they were both spirals, perfect spirals like the one shown in the night photo over norway in december 2009; only these were not fluorescent.  they were not discipating as we drove along.  we were headed to work, hence we could't observe longer, nor did it occur to me that i could relate the shape to the norway incident.  it was just today, a day and a half later, i searched cloud spirals and ran across the norway photos and recognized the shape to be exactly what we saw.  the source of these spirals was behind the clouds; no rotating or spinning at the base as in the norway indicent (at least at the time we observed).  the source or point of origin was not visible to us. it appeared to be the leftovers of whatever experiment was going on earlier.  they were very well marked still.
content.summary: 2 dark spirals emanating from the clouds; partly cloudy sky

content.detailedDescription: Watching the spotlight of the new supermarket 6 blocks away, just to see how far the light travelled. full moon, few stars. i was sitting on my porch facing south. at 10 pm, 2200 hours, the spotlights turned off, but stars were still not very visable. i noticed what i thought was a star suddenly appear in the sky, near what i was told by my neighbor is casiopea. it was white and stationary, but suddenly it pulsated red and white. it then began to move in an odd manner. the best way i can describe it is that it fluttered. the way a butterfly flys in an unpredictable pattern. it was very distant and small, the size of a star. it moved east to west, darting about. my companion saw it as well, he also thought it was very odd, but wasn't interested. i got my neighbor, but within 3 minutes time it had disappeared. it then reappeared farther south. i went to get my neighbor again, but he missed it again, as it was gone in 5 minutes or less. i saw the odd craft again, back in it's original position, but this time there was also a blue light. a second craft appeared that flashed only red and white, and they flew parallel east to west for a bit. just a few minutes really and they were gone. again, i saw them in their original location, but this time there was what appeared to be traditional aircraft flying near the odd aircraft. these two plans flew in a straight line, and looked the way i am accustomed to planes. i believe the two new planes to be our own military aircraft, as their flight pattern was predictable, and their lighting did not pulsate or change. in addition, these new aircraft were constantly visible, while the two original aircraft disappeared and reappeared. all four planes flew parallel to each other, until the normal aircraft reached a point in the western sky. at this time the odd "planes" continued to disappear in the west, reappear in the east, and then travel west again. for some time only the "normal" crafts were visible cirlcing in the west. again a single ufo, for lack of a better term, was back, but this time it was northeast. the craft took off very quickly, in a blur, with great speed, and vanished. i was actually very afraid, but very curious at the same time. this activity began at 10, just after the spot lights went out. i went in at 2227, so i don't know how long it actually lasted. my neighbor, an avid ufo person told me he had no doubt i was seeing alien activity. he did not actually see the craft however. just curious if anyone else saw these lights. omaha is very near offut airforce base. actually, i am about 20 miles from the base, as i live on the douglas county/sarpy county line.
content.summary: Red, white occasionally blue darting flashing light.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cigarette on the porch looking at the stars, when i saw 2 red, slowly blinking lights floating across the sky at a decent pace. immediately, i thought ufo. i've seen quite a few indescribable objects in the sky over the years. i immediately felt a sense of extreme excitement, and a bit of fear. this feeling persisted throughout the encounter. these particular 2 lights were (from my point of view) about 3 inches apart in the sky, (further distance up close of course), following each other perfectly, keeping the exact same distance apart at all times. they moved to the east, banking smoothly towards chicago. another appeared as if out of nowhere, heading south, then banking east again towards the city, smoother than any plane or helicopter i have ever seen, but this one left a small contrail behind it that looked like a small cloud, and it slowly dissipated. the last came from the north, moving south again and did the same as the last. they were all blinking at the same rate, a very slow, dull pulsing. they all eventually faded out. there was no sound to be heard, and the lights were bright enough to be viewed behind thick clouds.
content.summary: Four slowly blinking red lights floating across the sky in strange patterns

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 7:45pm arizona time on may 27, 2010, i stepped out onto the patio for a cigarette. i had just lit the cigarette and was looking toward the east when i noticed a golden light in the sky. at first i thought it was an airplane heading for sky harbor airport. a second light suddenly appeared and i was wondering where the second plane had come from when a third light appeared. when the fourth light appeared, i realized that i was seeing something out of the ordinary and i called for my daughter-in-law to come outside--she also witnessed part of this display. when the fifth light appeared the first light disappeared. the second light disappear a second later. then the third...Fourth...And fifth. once all these lights were gone, the sequence repeated itself. it repeated four or five times. at the time, the sky was still a light blue and i could see that there was nothing else in the sky--no planes or helicopters or hot air balloons. these were not flares being dropped or being shot into the sky. they were lights popping on and off in sequence. and there was no sound from the sky. let me add that they were not fireworks either. my daughter-in-law says the pattern these lights created as they popped on and off reminded her of a catipilar crawling across the sky. 
and if that isn't crazy enough, i got the impression that these objects had been traveling at a great rate of speed and had just come to a screaching halt as they appeared. while visible, they did not move. they did not spin or rotate or levitate up, down or sideways. they simply appeared from out of nowhere and then disappeared again. i would say this event could not have lasted for more than a minute. but i know what i saw! and it was not flares, fireworks, swamp gas, ball lightening, a temperature inversion or any other explainable thing. what i saw was impossible... yet it happened. unfortunately, it did not last long enough to get pictures or video.
content.summary: Witnessed gold lights popping on and off in sky

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 8:12 pdt i observed a blue light in the western sky traveling due north at a high rate of speed.  conditions were high overcast with an opening where the setting sun was visable.  i estimate the cloud ceiling at between 15-20k feet.  at first i thought is was a meteor however there was no trail and it was below cloud level.  there was no sound.  i believe the object was parallel with the coast approximately 30 miles west of the location where it was observed.  observed speed is estimated between 5-7 times greater than commercial passenger aircraft.

the color was interesting in that it was a color similar to the blue/white color of certain car headlights.  it was very bright but no defined form.

i'm only reporting this to see if others observed this.  so far, i have not been able to locate any observations posted on the internet.
content.summary: Brilliant blue light moving north at a very high rate of speed.
Object observed hoovering over a water tower in lemon,s.D. before traveling west to east , then accelerated to beyond visual range in  "a milisecond"

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the hollywood hills on a desolate cul de sac high in the mountains at an elevation of about 1100 feet above sea level.  last night behind my house and directly above my backyard which is on a heavily wooded canyon - there was a series of very mysterious white lights (olbong and oval shaped) that appeared across the canyon at the skyline (at cloud level) atop of the opposite canyon ridge.  i was looking out the window at the sky around midnight, getting ready for bed.  i noticed that it was unusually very bright outside because it was nearly a full moon last night.  it was otherwise very quiet and still.  at first a single white orb appeared and looked like it was "skipping" across the sky very rapidly then it would move to the center of a roughly circular pattern it was traveling and then other white "orbs" would appear.  the white orbs (roughly 6-8 total) would almost touch in the center and then spread out in a wheel like/spoke pattern almost like a ballet. it reminded me of an air show with fighter jets where the jets travel in formation and then they form a pattern in the center and then shoot off from a center formation.  

this light show continued for the better part of an hour until well past 1 a.M. the "firing"/appearance of the white orbs would be random. first one would appear, then travel in roughly a circular pattern skipping through the clouds - it moved rapidly towards the center of the circular path and then other orbs would appear and then shoot out from the center.  there was no noise/sound associated with these lights.  i was not frightened by these lights - they appeared to be "playing" tag or skipping around very playfully. they were moving very rapidly.   i was trying to think of how these lights could possibly be explained - were they lasers? if so, where would the lasers come from? were they lightening balls? (it was not storming, although it was partly cloudy). it was not possible that these were lasers because the canyon itself below is not very heavily populated and all of the neighbors' lights were out - as if everyone was in bed as it was after midnight.  overall, it was a very strange and mysterious occurrence. the lights stopped as abruptly as they started.  did anyone else see these lights?!
content.summary: Mysterious white orbs over hollywood hills/caheunga pass canyon

content.detailedDescription:
I was shooting the sunset with my camera as i am a nature photographer.

http://brendasue-katescabinatrainbowcreek.Blogspot.Com/2010_05_01_archive.Html

the above is my blogspot where i have descriptions and photos.

it is a rocket spaceship orbiting the earth as i got photos again on the25

i could see it as it was lit by the sun. it kept flying until it was out of the sunlight of sunset.

i can find no news saying we have launced a rocket, maybe you know, please advise

my feekings were: what is that   what is that what is that?

thank you brendasue
content.summary: Http://brendasue-katescabinatrainbowcreek.Blogspot.Com/2010_05_01_archive.Html

content.detailedDescription: On the night of april 24th at approximately 9:30 p.M. my aunt paula and i were talking on the side of the road when we observed 5 round starlike objects right above a mountain not far from her house. they were very bright and seemed to be communicating with each other. it seemed as though they were on some kind of mission, like they were working.They were crossing paths and going into one another and when they did they lit up very bright. they were northwest of where we were standing. we started filming them with a night vision camera.After about three hours we were joined by another person who also wittnesed what we were seeing. we were able to observe them for about one more hour.At that point a helicopter flew right over the top of where we were standing and was heading straight towards the starlike objects. they seamed not to mind to much at first,they actually got very bright. then as the helicopter got right up to where they were the starlike objects started to move behind a rock until we could no longer see them. the three of us stood on the road and were sort of angry at what we had just wittnesed.We were debating on what to do next when we saw the lights come back into view.We were so excited, we couldnt believe that they had come back. shortly after that they left for good. right before we got in the car to leave i looked up in the sky one last time and saw a bright green streak of light shoot up in the sky right over where we were standing.
content.summary: Ufo's on video

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside. i was not tired, driving, or in any way on drugs. i just happened to observe the skies because something caught my attention. as i look far to my left, i could see what looked to be a blimp in the air.I then take get up and move to get a better look at this. this was approximately one mile eastbound above the vineyards. the object was dark, but i could see a blue light towards the left. also the object had a red and blue light on.  
     i then watch the object shoot down a clear beam of light. throughout the time it was on, it was rotating counterclockwise. almost as if it was looking for something. after a few seconds, the light shut off. 
     next there were yellow square lights inside. the pattern looked to be a straight line horizontal cut in half. after the object made a v shaped light in yellow lights. this v shaped pattern looked like a pointer ">" without the point. 
     soon the object flew slow and low across the vineyards westbound.It produced a loud vibration noise. which could be heard within the area. no trail was left behind in any way. as it flew closer to me, i got a good view at it. the shape was a disc (black). with a blue light on top middle of air craft. which the blue light looked like an vertical rectangular light attached. it flew straight across. 
    when the object began to fly lower, i could see underneath it. underneath it were  dozens of rectangular lights. these lights were black until they lighted up. it started from the left and kept lighting up reverse counter clockwise. then the lights lighted up in rows. there were three rows and nothing in the middle. after, the object made pyramid patterns. almost like as if it was trying to show a sign. i did not see anything inside the yellow lights, even when they lighted up one by one. the lights were huge. so that explains the clear view i had. 
     the flying saucer flew as low as street light view. it also flew directly across me. which i estimated 500 feet.  i am not a professional or trained to measure objects in the sky. so i estimate this was not wider than half a mile in diameter. so i was not seeing things with that much of a close encounter. i remained calm throughout the whole situation. 
     after the object headed towards the city. i watched the saucer turn a an angle and shut off all the lights. then there were two white bright lights it produced. this saucer flew at northwest, shut off all lights, and last produced a single blinking red light. the red light kept blinking as it headed off towards the city. almost like as if it was hiding its identity. which at the time could be identified as an airplane with just a single red light in blinking mode. 
     throughout the time it headed off to the city, the vibration noise it produced could still be heard for miles. until within minutes, it faded off as well as the noise.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying black saucer over paso robles, ca with several light patterns/colors.

content.detailedDescription:
At 10:15 p.M. tonight, two of our close neighbors on the next block called us to tell me that while they were putting out their garbage cans, they had been watching something unusual for the last half hour.  my husband and i grabbed our binoculars and went to the front yard to look out toward the west.  we saw something that was gyro-shaped or globe shaped and about 200 feet over the water in capri pass.  it was primarily white, but had colored lights (red, green, blue, and white) around it horizontally, and appeared almost transparent...Like you could see inside of it. it also looked like it had spheres or points going up and down from it. it dropped down low for a brief moment, then went back up slightly.  it hovered (no sound).  our neighbors (only a block away from us) drove over to our house with their binoculars and camera.  we all watched it until about 10:25 p.M. at which time it appeared to back away slowly over towards the gulf (still due west).  the night is clear, the moon is bright and to our east.  i called chief rodriguez at the fire station and asked if he could aim the weather cam in the direction of due west.  i went on the webcam to see if it was picking it up.  it was hard to see, but you could see a small white unknown object in the same location that we had wittnessed it.

while watching the object, it made us all feel in awe.  it was actually beautiful through the binoculars.
content.summary: Globe like somewhat transparent with a ring of colored lights (red, green, blue) and vertical white lights all around hovered and darted briefly up, down, to the side, about 200 feet over the water in the west about half a mile away - no noise

content.detailedDescription:
At 5:25am, on wednesday, may, 26, 2010, i observed a large cloud formation that spanned the sky from horizon-to-horizon, similar to the arc pattern a rainbow would make.  i did not see, however, the craft or vehicle that made the formation.

the first thing that comes to mind, was a jetliner's vapor trail. however, i have never in my life seen such a vapor trail that was large enough to expand from one horizon to another in such a perfect arch formation.  usually, vapor trails disappear behind a jetliner after some great lenghts.   

10 minutes from the time that i initially notice this, i observed smaller vapor trails that were being made by jetliners.  in comparison, maybe due to the distances between these objects, the jetliner vapor trails were much, much smaller, and did not last as long.  

i observed the formation for approximately 30 minutes.  for the duration of the time that i observed this formation, it was expanding very, very slowly as it disappeared.

though i believe that there are such things as real "ufos", and believe that i have witnessed one many years ago, i can't imagine what conventitional vehicle could make such a vapor trail that would last so long.  i'm really puzzled.  i'm wondering if there was an event with the space shuttle, becuase that would explain the formation being so high, and possibly why it was able to "arc" from one horizon to another.

i would love to hear an explanation from your scientific staff on this one.

thanks for your great work!
content.summary: Strange cloud formation (vapor trail) ....

content.detailedDescription:
Between the hours of 9:30 and 10:45 tonight, 5/26/10 i witnessed (8) different unknown objects high in the sky above 15102 zip code area. i had been out on my back deck viewing the moon through a small telescope with my daughters, because the moon appeared to be unusually bright.(3) of the objects were traveling in a northerly direction, (2) were traveling in a northwesterly direction and (3) were traveling due south, one of which stopped abruptly and shot back 180 degrees. most of the objects were seen individually, but on two occasions there were more than one in the sky at the same time.
 
all of these objects traveled extremely fast and erratically, stopping and starting in their general trajectories. in addition they seemed to meander to the left and right of their general path of travel. these objects were too far away to get any detail, but just appeared as bright dots in the sky. no contrails, no flashing lights, no sound, just constant steady lights. not a standard aircraft.The objects eventually moved out of sight.

i thought about attempting to film the objects, but my video recorder was not charged and i could not track them through the viewfinder on my cell phone.
 
this event was witnessed by me and my 12 year old daughter.
 
i didn't know who to report this to, but i wanted to make sure that i let somebody know while the information was still clear.
 
i seriously would not be surprised to wake up tomorrow to news reports of mass sightings.
content.summary: Unknown objects flying erratically high in the sky over bethel park, pa.
